name: money-tracker-fullstack
description: Full-stack Money Tracker application with React frontend and Node.js backend

scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.vercel:build: cd backend && npm install && npm run build && cd ../frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
